ops_unv_tmplt.script_windows:
#!/usr/bin/python # # -- # Name: UT_Informatica_RunWorkflow # Purpose: Universal Task Script to Run an Informatica Workflow # 1- Get Session ID (logon_token) # 2- Start Workflow # 3- Monitor Workflow Completion # 4- Get Session Log # 5- Close Session # Disclaimer # No support and no warranty are provided for this Universal Task. # The use of this document and the related Universal Task is on your own risk. # Before using this task in a production system, please perform extensive testing. # # Version History: # 0.1 NBU 2017-03-17 initial Version using a shell script and curl # 1.0 CCO 2017-10-02 Conversion from Shell Script Version to python # 1.1 NBU 2017-12-20 Using getWorkflowLog instead of getSessionLog # 2.0 NBU 2018-01-09 Added Logon Token support, Logging, doc strings and intensive error handling # 2.1 NBU 2018-01-11 Added support for Https connections
version = "2.1"
# -- Import required python modules
import argparse import sys import datetime import logging import requests from xml.dom.minidom import parse, parseString
# -- logging settings DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.${ops_var_loglevel}, format=' %(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')
# -- Main Logic Function def main(): """calls the required functions to run the informatica workflow""" SetVariables() # -- Set Variables from Universal Task Form or Command Line Input GetSessionID() # -- Create SessionID Request SOAP Envelope and Request Session ID StartWorkflow() # -- Start Informatica Workflow MonitorWorkflow() # -- Monitor Informatica Workflow GetWorkflowLogxml() # -- Return the session log CloseSession() # -- Logout from Session
# -- Set Variables from Universal Task Form or Command Line Input def SetVariables(): """Set Variables from Universal Task Form or Command Line Input""" parser=argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Purpose : Run Informatica Workflow') parser.add_argument("--port", default="${ops_var_info_port}") parser.add_argument("--host", default="${ops_var_info_host}") parser.add_argument("--domain", default="${ops_var_domainname}") parser.add_argument("--repository", default="${ops_var_repositoryname}") parser.add_argument("--username", default="${_credentialUser('${ops_var_infocred}')}") parser.add_argument("--password", default="${_credentialPwd('${ops_var_infocred}')}") parser.add_argument("--namespace", default="${ops_var_usernamespace}") parser.add_argument("--service", default="${ops_var_servicename}") parser.add_argument("--folder", default="${ops_var_foldername}") parser.add_argument("--workflow", default="${ops_var_workflowname}") parser.add_argument("--requestmode", default="${ops_var_requestmode}") parser.add_argument("--timeout", default="${ops_var_timeout}") parser.add_argument("--path", default="${ops_var_taskinstancepath}") parser.add_argument("--loglevel", default="${ops_var_loglevel}") parser.add_argument("--ssl", default="${ops_var_ssl}") global args global logon_token args=parser.parse_args() logging.info(" -- Executing version " + version + " with the following paramaters") logging.info(args) logging.info(" -- Informatica Workflow to run: " + args.workflow)
# -- Create SessionID Request SOAP Envelope and Request Session ID def GetSessionID(): """Create SessionID Request SOAP Envelope and Request Session ID""" # -- Create SOAP XML soap_xml = """ <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <ns0:Login xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <RepositoryDomainName>{domain}</RepositoryDomainName> <RepositoryName>{repository}</RepositoryName> <UserName>{username}</UserName> <Password>{password}</Password> <UserNameSpace>{namespace}</UserNameSpace> </ns0:Login> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope> """.format(domain=args.domain,repository=args.repository, username=args.username, password=args.password, namespace=args.namespace) # -- Set SoapCall() Parameters and Make SOAP Request soap_data = soap_xml.encode('utf-8') soap_url=args.ssl + args.host + ":" + args.port + "/wsh/services/BatchServices/Metadata" soap_headers = { 'content-type': 'text/soap+xml', 'charset': 'UTF-8', 'SOAPAction': 'login' } logging.info(" -- Requesting Session ID (SOAP Request)") logging.debug(" -- Request XML" + soap_xml) try: response = requests.post(soap_url, data=soap_data, headers=soap_headers, verify=False) response.raise_for_status() except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e: logging.error(' Failure : %s' %(e)) quit(1) else: logging.info("#UT_INFO# Request SessionId Succeeded with code : " + str(response.status_code)) logging.debug(" -- Response XML: " + str(response.text)) dom = parseString(response.content) for node in dom.getElementsByTagName('SessionId'): # visit every node global logon_token logon_token=str(node.childNodes[0].data)
# -- # -- Start Informatica Workflow def StartWorkflow(): """Start Informatica Workflow using the requested Session ID""" # -- Create SOAP XML soap_xml = """ <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsh=\"http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <soapenv:Header> <wsh:Context> <SessionId>{logon_token}</SessionId> </wsh:Context> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <wsh:StartWorkflow> <DIServiceInfo> <DomainName>{domain}</DomainName> <ServiceName>{service}</ServiceName> </DIServiceInfo> <FolderName>{folder}</FolderName> <WorkflowName>{workflow}</WorkflowName> <RequestMode>{requestmode}</RequestMode> </wsh:StartWorkflow> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope> """.format(logon_token=logon_token, domain=args.domain, service=args.service, folder=args.folder, workflow=args.workflow, requestmode=args.requestmode) # -- Set SoapCall() Parameters and Make SOAP Request soap_data = soap_xml.encode('utf-8') soap_url=args.ssl + args.host + ":" + args.port + "/wsh/services/BatchServices/DataIntegration?WSDL" soap_headers = { 'content-type': 'text/soap+xml', 'charset': 'UTF-8', 'SOAPAction': 'startWorkflow' } logging.info(" -- Starting Workflow (SOAP Request) WORKFLOW = " + args.workflow) logging.debug(" -- Request XML: " + soap_xml) try: response = requests.post(soap_url, data=soap_data, headers=soap_headers, verify=False) response.raise_for_status() except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e: logging.error(' Failure : %s' %(e)) logging.error(' Check that the Workflow: %s, foldername: %s and is_servicename: %s are correct.' % (args.workflow, args.folder, args.service) ) quit(1) else: logging.info(" Starting Workflow Succeeded with code : " + str(response.status_code)) logging.debug(" -- Response XML: " + str(response.text)) # -- # -- Monitor Informatica Workflow def MonitorWorkflow(): """Monitor Informatica Workflow""" # -- Create SOAP XML soap_xml = """ <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns0:Context xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <SessionId>{logon_token}</SessionId> </ns0:Context> </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns0:WaitTillWorkflowComplete xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <DIServiceInfo> <DomainName>{domain}</DomainName> <ServiceName>{service}</ServiceName> </DIServiceInfo> <FolderName>{folder}</FolderName> <WorkflowName>{workflow}</WorkflowName> <RequestMode>{requestmode}</RequestMode> </ns0:WaitTillWorkflowComplete> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope> """.format(logon_token=logon_token, domain=args.domain, service=args.service, folder=args.folder, workflow=args.workflow, requestmode=args.requestmode) # -- Set SoapCall() Parameters and Make SOAP Request soap_data = soap_xml.encode('utf-8') soap_url=args.ssl + args.host + ":" + args.port + "/wsh/services/BatchServices/DataIntegration?WSDL" soap_headers = { 'content-type': 'text/soap+xml', 'charset': 'UTF-8', 'SOAPAction': 'WaitTillWorkflowComplete' } logging.info(" -- Monitoring Workflow (SOAP Request) WORKFLOW = " + args.workflow) logging.debug(" -- Request XML: " + soap_xml) response = requests.post(soap_url, data=soap_data, headers=soap_headers, verify=False) logging.debug(" -- Response XML: " + str(response.text)) # -- # -- Return the session log def GetWorkflowLogxml(): """Return the session log from the Informatica Workflow""" soap_xml = """ <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns0:Context xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <SessionId>{logon_token}</SessionId> </ns0:Context> </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns0:getWorkflowLog xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <DIServiceInfo> <DomainName>{domain}</DomainName> <ServiceName>{service}</ServiceName> </DIServiceInfo> <FolderName>{folder}</FolderName> <WorkflowName>{workflow}</WorkflowName> <Timeout>{timeout}</Timeout> </ns0:getWorkflowLog> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope> """.format(logon_token=logon_token, domain=args.domain, service=args.service, folder=args.folder, workflow=args.workflow, timeout=args.timeout) # -- Set SoapCall() Parameters and Make SOAP Request soap_data = soap_xml.encode('utf-8') soap_url=args.ssl + args.host + ":" + args.port + "/wsh/services/BatchServices/DataIntegration?WSDL" soap_headers = { 'content-type': 'text/soap+xml', 'charset': 'UTF-8', 'SOAPAction': 'getWorkflowLog' } logging.info(" -- Workflow Log: " + args.workflow) logging.debug(" -- Request XML: " + soap_xml) response = requests.post(soap_url, data=soap_data, headers=soap_headers, verify=False) logging.info(" -- Response XML: " + str(response.text)) # -- # -- Logout from Session def CloseSession(): """Logout from Session""" soap_xml = """ <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Header> <ns0:Context xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"> <SessionId>{logon_token}</SessionId> </ns0:Context> </soap:Header> <soap:Body> <ns0:Logout xmlns:ns0="http://www.informatica.com/wsh"/> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope> """.format(logon_token=logon_token) # -- Set SoapCall() Parameters and Make SOAP Request soap_data = soap_xml.encode('utf-8') soap_url=args.ssl + args.host + ":" + args.port + "/wsh/services/BatchServices/Metadata" soap_headers = { 'content-type': 'text/soap+xml', 'charset': 'UTF-8', 'SOAPAction': 'Logout' } logging.info(" -- Closing Session (SOAP Request)") logging.debug(" -- Request XML: " + soap_xml) response = requests.post(soap_url, data=soap_data, headers=soap_headers, verify=False) logging.debug(" -- Response XML: " + str(response.text))
# --
main()
ops_unv_tmplt.name: UT_WIN_PC_StartWorkflow

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: foldername
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Name of the folder containing the workflow
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: foldername

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: loglevel
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: log level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: loglevel

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: workflowname
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Name of the workflow to run
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: workflowname

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: IS servicename
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Name of the Integration Service that runs the workflow.
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: servicename

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: requestmode
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Indicates the recovery strategy for the session task: - NORMAL. Restarts a session without recovery. - RECOVERY. Recovers a session.
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: requestmode
